text: Anton "Tony" Boskovic (27 January 1933 - 16 June 2022) was a Croatian-born Australian soccer referee. He was born in Blato, Croatia. He refereed two matches in the FIFA World Cup, one in 1974 and one in 1982.Tony Boskovic - 1974 and 1982 Australia's World Cup Referees He entered the Football Federation Australia Hall of Fame in 1999. Boskovic died on 16 June 2022, aged 89.VALE – Anton “Tony” Boskovic ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Association football referees Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:Australian men's soccer players
title: Tony Boskovic
